author: Special Correspondent
text:
The Election Commission would be celebrating the 6th National Voters’ Day throughout the State with the theme ‘Inclusive and Qualitative Electoral Participation’ on January 25.

The day would be observed in 65,616 polling stations. A State-level function would be held at Raj Bhavan, where Governor K. Rosaiah would administer National Voters’ Day pledge and give away EPIC cards to newly registered voters, according to an official release.

In the districts too, the voter’s pledge would be administered in government offices, schools and colleges on January 25.
title: National Voters’ Day on Jan. 25
